titleStmt.title: The puritaine or The vviddovv of VVatling-streete Acted by the Children of Paules. Written by W.S.
Puritan
titleStmt.author: W. S.
Smith, Wentworth, fl. 1601-1623, attributed name.
Middleton, Thomas, d. 1627, attributed name.

notesStmt.note: Sometimes attributed to Thomas Middleton and to Wentworth Smith; misattributed to William Shakespeare.
Running title reads: The puritaine widdow.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
